group_1.textCenter: We'll use all our power to defend ourselves@from any threat!
You'll understand how serious I am@when you see what I'm about to do to you!

group_1.textRight: Noooooo!

group_1.textLeft: Get out of my way, Ayame.

group_1.textRight: You can't... You gotta stop this!
Ya can't just fight everyone who isn't one@of us...
That's...that's just...nngh... It's wrong!@It's just wrong!

group_1.textLeft: Come on, aren't you the one who's always@rushing into battle?

group_1.textRight: Fightin' Witches is a totally different@story, though!
Don'tcha see...? C'mon, quit it, Konoha!

group_1.textLeft: Let's see...

group_1.textRight: Wah! Wh-where'd she go?!

group_1.textLeft: Hyahhh!

group_1.textRight: U-uwah!
Stop this...Konoha. Please!
Yachiyo!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, you blocked it... Impressive. I'd expect@no less from the venerable one.

group_1.textRight: Ugh... Please don't call me that.

group_1.textLeft: So you're going to be the first to stand in @my way?

group_1.textRight: I take it you won't change your mind.
In that case, you leave me no choice!

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki...you're here...

group_1.textRight: Hazuki!
Konoha...
[chara:100200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh!
And with her, that's...
M-Momoko!

group_1.textLeft: Momoko[chara:302600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]? Momoko Togame?!

group_1.textRight: Whoa things are gettin' pretty intense@around here, aren't they?
What happened? What're you doin'...

group_1.textLeft: What are you doing with her, Hazuki?!

group_1.textRight: Ayame said you want to fight all the other@Magical Girls?
I'm not gonna let you do something that dumb!

group_1.textLeft: Answer my question right now, Hazuki!

group_1.textRight: She's helping me find the real culprit.
We've been searching together for a while@now.
You have...?!
Wh-why didn't you tell US, then?!
I was gonna tell you once we had somethin'@worth tellin' you... Sorry!
So...did you find anything?
No, ya see...

group_1.textLeft: Who cares?!

group_1.textRight: Whoa...
Just listen, Konoha...

group_1.textLeft: We can't rely on anyone except ourselves.@We've always lived by that rule...
So, why... Why did you go off on your own@and do this, without telling me?!

group_1.textRight: This might be the best time...

group_1.textLeft: Time? For what...?

group_1.textRight: There's something I've wanted to tell@you, because I've been thinking lately...

group_1.textLeft: About what?

group_1.textRight: We need to be more open to the outside world.

group_1.textLeft: What are you saying?!

group_1.textRight: I know that other people have only caused us@trouble since we were little...
So I really do understand how you feel.
But I also started to realize something.
Maybe we aren't the only ones out there who@are trustworthy...

group_1.textLeft: But we are... That's how we made it this far!
It's always been that way since we left the@Azalea House... Always!

group_1.textRight: Maybe, but what about the director?

group_1.textLeft: No...that's not...

group_1.textRight: And our friends at the Azalea House?

group_1.textLeft: That's completely different!

group_1.textRight: No, it isn't!

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki...

group_1.textRight: We just forgot ever since we cut ourselves@off from the rest of the world...
But back then, we were surrounded by people@we could open our hearts to.

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki...

group_1.textRight: So why can't there be people like that@around us now?

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki...

group_1.textRight: If we just look around, we might find people@we can trust!

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki, STOP IT!

group_1.textRight: Konoha...

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki, stop it! Just stop it!
Why?@Why would you say that?!

group_1.textRight: Are you crying?

group_1.textLeft: I...I just! I only need you and Ayame!
I just want the three of us. Just us three.@...Just us!
That's all I want! Nothing else...
We lost the director... We had to leave the@Azalea House!
You're all I have left in the world!

group_1.textRight: You've been thinking so much about us...

group_1.textLeft: That's why I can't stand it. I can't stand@the thought of other people coming in...
If I'm honest...
I'm afraid...
Someone might try to destroy something@precious to me again...
That's why... That's why I can't!

group_5.textCenter: That's why... That's why I can't!
